summary:
The World Trade Center (WTC) in New York City is being rebuilt after the original buildings were destroyed on September 11, 2001. The new complex includes several skyscrapers, a memorial, and a museum. The tallest building is One World Trade Center, standing at 104 stories. The site also features Liberty Park and the Perelman Performing Arts Center.

Construction started in 2006, with the first building, 7 World Trade Center, opening in 2006. The National September 11 Memorial opened in 2011, and One World Trade Center was completed in 2014. The transportation hub and other buildings have also been finished, while plans for 2 World Trade Center are on hold.
